 The DepthSense::BaseValueType of the object.
 

Detailed Description

This class derives from DepthSense::BaseValue and is used to access the system calibration.

Property Documentation

DepthSense::ExtrinsicParameters DepthSense::SystemCalibrationValue::extrinsics
readwrite

The coordinate system used for the extrinsics is the one specified through coordinateSystemType property.
